description:
As a LPA Planning Officer
  I want to provide the Planning Inspectorate with documents that was used to notify interested parties on the application.
  So that this can form part of the Inspectors decision.
name: Notifying interested parties of the appeal

elements.name: AC1 Access Notifying interested parties of the appeal about the application question

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
a LPA Planning Officer is reviewing their LPA Questionnaire task list
LPA Planning Officer chooses to upload the document Notifying interested parties of the appeal
LPA Planning Officer is presented with the ability to upload any documents relevant to the question Notifying interested parties of the appeal

elements.name: AC2 Task list shows the correct initial status

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
LPA Planning Officer has not added any data to the Notifying interested parties of the appeal question
LPA Planning Officer is reviewing the Task List
the status is not started

elements.name: AC3 LPA Planning Officer successfully uploads file via upload button

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Notifying interested parties of the appeal is requested
valid file 'upload-file-valid.tiff' is successfully uploaded for 'notifyingParties'
progress is made to the task list
Notifying interested parties of the appeal subsection is shown as completed

elements.name: AC3 LPA Planning Officer successfully uploads file via upload button

progress is made to the task list
Notifying interested parties of the appeal subsection is shown as completed

elements.name: AC6 LPA Planning Officer selects invalid file size

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Notifying interested parties of the appeal is requested
invalid files 'upload_file_large.tiff' have been selected for 'notifyingParties'
progress is halted with a message the file 'upload_file_large.tiff' 'is too big'

elements.name: AC7 LPA Planning Officer selects Invalid file format

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Notifying interested parties of the appeal is requested
invalid files 'upload-file-invalid-wrong-type.csv' have been selected for 'notifyingParties'
progress is halted with a message the file 'upload-file-invalid-wrong-type.csv' 'format is incorrect'

elements.name: AC8 LPA Planning Officer selects to return to previous page

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Notifying interested parties of the appeal is requested
a file has been uploaded for 'notifyingParties'
Back is then requested
the LPA Planning Officer is taken to the Task List
any document uploaded will not be saved

elements.name: AC9 LPA Planning Officer deletes a file prior to save and continue

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
a file has been uploaded for 'notifyingParties'
LPA Planning Officer deletes the file
the file is removed

elements.name: AC10 LPA Planning Officer deletes a file after save and continue

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
a file has been uploaded and confirmed for 'notifyingParties'
Notifying interested parties of the appeal is requested
LPA Planning Officer deletes the file
the file is removed

elements.name: AC11 LPA Planning Officer returns to the completed Notifying interested parties of the appeal

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
The question 'Notifying interested parties of the appeal' has been completed for 'notifyingParties'
Notifying interested parties of the appeal is requested
the information they previously entered is still populated

elements.name: AC12 Appeal details side panel

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Notifying interested parties of the appeal is requested
the appeal details panel is displayed on the right hand side of the page

elements.name: AC13 JavaScript Disabled

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
Notifying interested parties of the appeal is requested
valid file 'upload-file-valid.tiff' is successfully uploaded for 'notifyingParties'
progress is made to the task list
Notifying interested parties of the appeal subsection is shown as completed

elements.name: AC14 Check your answers

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
all the mandatory questions for the questionnaire have been completed
Check your Answers is displayed
Notifying interested parties of the appeal heading is shown and the uploaded file name should be displayed

elements.name: AC15 Change answers

steps.name: an appeal has been created
a questionnaire has been created
the LPA Planning Officer is authenticated
a change to answer 'Notifying interested parties of the appeal' is requested from Change your answers page
an answer is saved for 'notifyingParties'
progress is made to the Check Your Answers page
the updated answer is displayed
